item.title: Designing 3-Way Initial Blocks [Video]
item.description: In my experimentsÂ with Fusion360 recently and casting around for inspiration, I stumbled across my old copy of Godel, Escher, Bach: An Eternal Golden Braid, which has a curious cover design consisting of two objects that cast shadows of three different letters along three different axes.
